version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvement.

1. Image text detection improved.
2. Gave support for more languages to detect text on image.
minor bug fixes.

1. minor bug fixes - button overlaps with banner advertisement.
2. performance improvement.

1. Text extraction speed and accuracy improved by optimising image size.
2. iphone-x support.
3. Minor bug fixes and UI Changes.
1. bug fixes.

1.Gave support for older ios devices.
2.Bug fixes.

1. Navigation bar and status bar overlap issue fixed.
2. Extracted Text size increased to easy editing.
3. Minor bug fixes.

1. Swipe right of scan page rows to share and delete.
2. UI Changes and Bug fixes.

1. in crop page itself shown option to select language of text on image.
2. iphone-x device status bar overlaps issue fixed.
3. UX/UI Improvements.
1. Bug fixes.

1. Gave option to don't show startup popup.
2. UX/UI Improvement.
1. Bug Fixes.

1. Translations in over 100 languages on extracted text.
2. Ui changes and bug fixes.
Security update and bug fixes.

1. Text Extraction on background.
2. Bug fixes.

1. Offline OCR Process on English and other Latin based languages.
2. OCR Process speed improved.
3. Switching between image and extracted text simplified.
4. Bug fixes.

1. New app icon design.
2. UI Changes and bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes and usability improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvement.

1. Image text detection improved.
2. Gave support for more languages to detect text on image.

1. Text Extraction Accuracy improved.
2. Gave support for latest iOS version.
